casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Demario Lamont SNEAD. No. 90PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. C. Scott Holmes, Wilmington, for Snead, Demario Lamont. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Staples S. Hughes, Durham, for Snead, Demario Lamont. Ms. Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of March 2015 by Defendant-Appellee to Deem Response to Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
